mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale_returns_sheet (id, sale_sheet_id, supplier, operator, remark, state, create_time, salesman, raw_total_amount, discount, final_amount, voucher_amount) VALUES (#{id}, #{saleSheetId}, #{supplier}, #{operator}, #{remark}, #{state}, #{create_time}, #{salesman}, #{rawTotalAmount}.#{discount}, #{finalAmount}, #{state}, #{createTime});

INSERT INTO sale_returns_sheet_content (id, sale_returns_sheet_id, pid, quantity, total_price, unit_price, remark) VALUES
(#{item.id},#{item.saleReturnsSheetId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.totalPrice},#{item.unitPrice},#{item.remark})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sale_returns_sheet ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT wosc.id, wosc.pid, wosc.warehouse_output_sheet_id, wosc.batch_id, wosc.quantity, wosc.sale_price, wosc.remark FROM warehouse_output_sheet wos LEFT JOIN warehouse_output_sheet_content wosc on wos.id = wosc.warehouse_output_sheet_id WHERE wos.sale_sheet_id = #{saleSheetId} AND wosc.pid = #{pid};
